verbose_text: We have used percent infection as the readout of activity conferred by anti-dengue Fc afucosylation and of FcgammaRIIIa signaling in ADE of dengue virus infections, yet FcgammaRIIIa signaling activity likely impacts disease pathogenesis through multiple mechanisms, including modulation of cytokine production by FcgammaRIIIa expressing cells.
